front.title: •Tauntaun Bones
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on table. Each opponent's destiny draw, you do the following: (0) Put top used card in hand. (1) lose 1 Force. (2) activate 1 Force. (3) lose this Effect. (4) retrieve top lost card. (5) deploy a character for free. (6+) nothing.
front.lore: The bones of a tauntaun represent both death and life: death for the prey, life for the predator. A symbol of the ebb and flow of the Force through all things.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
